message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  While I appreciate your offer, I'm looking for something closer to $130.  Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $122. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
